Enter your text: following are my symptons-murchha,apasmara,shosha,unmada,karshya. Suggest me a drug
output:
'
Based on the context information, Ashvagandharishta (AFI 200 ml) would be the suggested drug for the given symptoms. The dose would be 12-24 ml and it can be used in both OPD and IPD.

Enter your text: Abhayarishta is used for what purpose and can you suggest the dosage also are there any side effects
output:
'
Abhayarishta is an Ayurvedic medicine used to treat digestive disorders, such as indigestion, constipation, and abdominal pain. The recommended dosage is 10-20 ml twice daily, after meals. Possible side effects include nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
